comment: Got mine a week ago! Soreness in the arm like a flu shot but other than that I'm good. I did have a headache afterwards for a little bit but it could have been a little anxiety maybe? It was so mild i may not have noticed it normally.
amr:

                                          :name (n2 / name
                                                :op1 "influenza"))))))
            :ARG2 (g2 / good-02

      :snt3 (c2 / contrast-01

comment: Good luck! Got my first dose today and I feel great. Hope all goes well for you!
